Folder.name: Functional Requirements
Folder.Requirement: The application must display a map on the main webpage after a loading time. There should also be a top sticky header.

Users must be able to interact with four types of elements on the map: station_label station ligne_label ligne_tracks Clicking on any of these elements should change the corresponding colors on the webpage.

A search bar must be present in a sticky header at the top of the page. Users must be able to search for station_label or ligne_label by name. The search results should highlight the relevant element on the map.

The application must have a hamburger menu on the sticky that opens a left panel when clicked. The left panel must contain text indications (instructions or information). The left panel must include a switch list, where each switch can change the color of an element on the main map.
Thwhen loading a specific line or station the application should directly load on the station

Folder.name: UI/UX Requirements
Folder.Requirement: The sticky header must always remain visible when scrolling or grabbing the screen.
The hamburger menu must be accessible and easy to use. changing its state as the user click on it
The map interactions should be smooth with visual feedback when elements are selected. the user should be able to scrool and smooth up to it's defined limits
The search results should be clearly displayed.
The left panel should be properly styled and not obstruct key functionalities.

Folder.name: Performance Requirements
Folder.Requirement: The map must load within 3 seconds on a stable internet connection and begin the zoom animation when loaded.
Interactions (clicking on elements, toggling switches) should have a response time of less than 5ms including easing animation time.
The search functionality should return results almost instantly.
The left panel must open and close smoothly within 3ms including easing animation time.
The user can navigate on the map

Folder.name: Accessibility Requirements
Folder.Requirement: the search bar should be navigable with the keyboard
The application should be compatible with most scale readers on desktop.
The User can change the color mode displayed on the map.
